activities: OrgSync is an online community management system marketed to colleges and universities. All data collected in this system is requested by administrators of those institutions. Our master subscription agreement states clearly that customer data belongs to the customer and not OrgSync.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
